nodes.text: A Jedi outpost was located on the Outer Rim Territories astronomical object Tempes. Constructed during the days of the High Republic Era, the outpost housed several Jedi artifacts, including holocrons, and Jedi Temple Guard armor, during the Imperial Era. During this time, aspiring Jedi Luke Skywalker traveled to the outpost, where he encountered the spirit of the long-deceased Grand Inquisitor. Skywalker would duel the Inquisitor, and, after defeating him, claim a lightsaber from the temple and return to the Alliance Fleet.
